org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.providers
Interface IAeStorageProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAeAttachmentStorageProvider, IAeCoordinationStorageProvider, IAeProcessStateConnectionProvider, IAeProcessStateStorageProvider, IAeQueueStorageProvider, IAeTransmissionTrackerStorageProvider, IAeURNStorageProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAbstractSQLStorageProvider, AeAbstractXMLDBStorageProvider, AeSQLAttachmentStorageProvider, AeSQLCoordinationStorageProvider, AeSQLProcessStateConnectionProvider, AeSQLProcessStateStorageProvider, AeSQLQueueStorageProvider, AeSQLTransmissionTrackerStorageProvider, AeSQLURNStorageProvider, AeXMLDBAttachmentStorageProvider, AeXMLDBCoordinationStorageProvider, AeXMLDBProcessStateConnectionProvider, AeXMLDBProcessStateStorageProvider, AeXMLDBQueueStorageProvider, AeXMLDBTransmissionTrackerStorageProvider, AeXMLDBURNStorageProvider
public interface IAeStorageProvider

The base interface for all storage delegates. This interface will be extended by the more concrete storage delegates, such as Queue, Process, etc.

Method Summary
 IAeStorageConnection getCommitControlDBConnection()
          Gets a commit control DB connection.
 IAeStorageConnection getDBConnection()
          Gets an auto-commit DB connection.
 IAeStorageConnection getTxCommitControlDBConnection()
          Gets a transaction DB connection.
